name: Fishing the Deep (NDS)
description:
Fish the deepest depths of the ocean with this Nintendo DS Homebrew Game!

Play on your PC using the provided NDS Emulator or play on your actual DS console using a DS flash cart.

Created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo Event.

Source code is also provided as part of the event and for those who want to learn more about Ds Game Maker and developing homebrew DS games.
